name: Delve (itch) (ompu co)
description:
Ludum Dare 48 Jam entry by:

Sam Blye Harrison Bright Jesse Hamel Anthony Varallo Quade Zaban

Gamepad is recommended

Gamepad controls:
Left thumbstick: Move
Right thumbstick: Look
A: Place/release climbing rope
Left/Right triggers: ascend/descend rope

Mouse/Keyboard controls:
WASD: Move
Mouse: Look
Left click: Place/release climbing rope
Q/E: ascend/descend rope
